text:
Bundesliga
Leipzig - Mainz: Festival at the Red Bull Arena!
As part of the Bundesliga 10 day, Leipzig dominated Mainz on the river score of 8-0. Timo Werner scored a hat-trick in this encounter.
02 Nov 2019, 16:35 by Charlie Creteur



Anthony Lopes - 7 / 10Selivered twice against Timo Werner at the beginning of the game, the Lyon goalkeeper made several decisive parries. Impeccable in his interventions, he appears as a true value of the workforce Rhone. Champions League level.Icon Sport



Youssouf Kon√© - 6The former Lille has delivered a serious performance, focusing more on his defensive tasks in the left lane. Focused, he was more offensive during the second act.Icon Sport



Mar√ßal - 5.5Pris speed by Timo Werner early in the game, the former Guingampais later recovered to level with his defensives.Icon Sport



Joachim Andersen - 6.5 A solid performance. In the duels as in anticipation, the former Sampdoria justified its purchase price and transfer this summer in the Rhone. Safe and risk-free in his raises.Icon Sport



Marcelo - 7The boss of the Lyon defense tonight. Unbeatable in the duels, the Brazilian has anticipated many hot actions in his surface. Clean in the raise, has tried several times to lengthen the game and find his attackers in the back of the German rearguard.Icon Sport



L√©o Dubois - 6.5 The captain of the Gones showed the example. Focused on his defensive duties in his right lane in the first period, the Frenchman was able to engage more offensively in the second. Boss.Icon Sport size



Houssem Aouar - 7The symbol of the pressing undertaken by his team tonight, the midfielder has demen√© on all fronts. His selflessness allowed Depay to open the scoring and recover countless balloons. With the baton, he showed himself just technically. Has often combined with Depay. Replaced at the end of the match by Jean Lucas.Icon Sport



Lucas Tousart - 6A task of sappe all the moments. In the oven and the mill in the first half, the former Valenciennois fought hard in the duels and ball recovery. More present in the use of the ball in the second half. Strong, applied and concerned.Icon Sport



Thiago Mendes - 6He also scratched many balloons. The former Lille has already focused on his defensive work and midfield, before engaging more forward in the second period. One of the main launching ramps of Gones.Icon Sport



Martin Terrier - 6.5 Sylvinho's surprise. Aligned entry to the place of Moussa Demb√©l√©, the former Strasbourg made a tireless defensive work. First defender of his team, his self-sacrifice paid offensively after the hour of play, through a second decisive goal (65th, 0-2). Replaced by Bertrand Traor√© in the 69th minute.Icon Sport



Memphis Depay - 7A constant threat. The number one danger of the Gones, the Dutchman has set his own on the right track on a full of coolness (11th, 0-1). In all the good offensive moves, he showed a lot of application in his defensive withdrawal and his duels. Replaced in the 79th minute by Moussa Demb√©l√©.Icon Sport

Leipzig-OL: the notes of the Lyonnais




The club founded in 2009 by the Red Bull group returns to the podium of the Bundesliga in the most beautiful way! The RB Leipzig crushed his opponent from the Mainz day on the 10th day of the Bundesliga. Indeed, the players of Julian Nagelsmann won the score of 8-0! Sabitzer opened the scoring in the 5th minute before Timo Werner's treble (30th, 48th, 87th) but also the achievements of Christopher Nkunku (35th), Halstenberg (39th), Poulsen (44th) and Mukiele (50th)







The next opponents of Leipzig:
